description: I loved Rollercoaster Tycoon and am so happy that it is available on Ubuntu as OpenRCT2 ... there will be hours of enjoyment for sure!
I didn't used it alot as of now on my phone since its not that good to use without a mouse but it seems to work just fine
The game starts with an error, then asks to allocate game files from GOG.
Tons of QoL changes and it's easier to install mods, easilly the best way to play RCT1/2
summary: The best way to play RCT1/2

description: Yes it's every bit the old game, but it's just better! Not only that, it runs great on Steam Deck through Flatpak -- updates to the OS won't wipe out the game if installed this way. I'm happy to be able to relive this wonderful game and look forward to the continued development of the open version.

you cant get much better than this.
if you're a fan of rct2, you're a fan of this.
have fun with online multiplayer and fun cheats and stuff
summary: amazing port of an amazing game

description: Awesome game, but theres a bug on version 0.4.4 from using the test ride simulation (blue flag button) while building some coasters. If you touch that button you'll no longer be able to open your ride when its finished, saying "missing entrance/exit" even when you clearly have them.
The game is stable on this than wine and windows
summary: Great RCT software to work with Celeron

description: Läuft wunderbar unter Linux und wird zeitnah Upgedated
el juego recuerda mucho a este que hacias parque de Sega y PC (tambien en playstation) es bueno!

Permet de jouer en HD et même en réseau sur Internet. Les ajouts ne dénaturent pas le jeu et l’ensemble est parfaitement stable, une superbe découverte !
Nb : nécessite les fichiers originaux pour jouer (CD, iso, GOG/Steam…)
